title: Executive Virtual Assistant
description: Support C-level executives with administrative tasks, calendar management, email correspondence, and project coordination. This role requires exceptional communication skills and the ability to handle confidential information with discretion.

questions.text: Describe a time when you had to manage multiple urgent priorities for an executive. How did you handle the situation?
How do you ensure confidentiality when handling sensitive executive information?
Walk us through your process for managing an executive's complex calendar with frequent changes.
Describe your experience with travel planning and what tools you use to ensure smooth business trips.
How would you handle a situation where you need to decline meeting requests on behalf of your executive?

title: Customer Success Virtual Assistant
description: Help clients achieve their goals by providing exceptional support, onboarding assistance, and relationship management. Perfect for someone who loves helping others succeed and building long-term relationships.

questions.text: Tell us about a time when you turned a frustrated customer into a satisfied one. What was your approach?
How do you prioritize multiple customer requests when resources are limited?
Describe your process for onboarding new customers to ensure their success.
How do you identify when a customer might be at risk of churning, and what steps would you take?

title: Social Media Virtual Assistant
description: Manage social media accounts, create engaging content, schedule posts, and analyze performance metrics. This role is perfect for creative individuals who understand social media trends and audience engagement.

questions.text: Show us your creative process for developing engaging social media content for a business.
How do you stay current with social media trends and algorithm changes across different platforms?
Describe a successful social media campaign you've managed and the results you achieved.
How would you handle negative comments or a PR crisis on social media?
Walk us through how you would analyze and report on social media performance metrics.

title: Research & Data Virtual Assistant
description: Conduct market research, compile data reports, and provide analytical insights to support business decisions. This role requires strong analytical skills and attention to detail.

questions.text: Describe your methodology for conducting thorough market research on a new industry.
How do you ensure the accuracy and reliability of data you collect from various sources?
Walk us through how you would present complex research findings to non-technical stakeholders.
Tell us about a time when your research uncovered surprising insights that changed a business strategy.

title: Content Creation Virtual Assistant
description: Write blog posts, create marketing materials, develop email campaigns, and produce various forms of content to support marketing efforts. This role is ideal for skilled writers and creative thinkers.

questions.text: Share examples of different types of content you've created and explain your writing process.
How do you adapt your writing style for different audiences and platforms?
Describe your approach to SEO content writing and keyword optimization.
How do you handle writer's block and maintain creativity when producing content regularly?
Walk us through how you would develop a content strategy for a new business.

title: E-commerce Virtual Assistant
description: Manage online stores, handle product listings, process orders, and provide customer support for e-commerce businesses. This role requires familiarity with e-commerce platforms and strong organizational skills.

questions.text: Describe your experience with e-commerce platforms and which ones you're most comfortable using.
How would you optimize product listings to improve search visibility and conversion rates?
Walk us through your process for managing inventory and preventing stockouts.
How do you handle customer complaints about orders, shipping, or product issues?
